Bangunan Sekolah Roboh, Pakar: Mendikbud Baru Punya PR Besar
05 Nov 2019, 17:13 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Bangunan Sekolah Roboh, Pakar: Mendikbud Baru Punya PR Besar

KBRN, Jakarta : Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan (Mendikbud) yang baru saja dilantik, Nadiem Makarim punya pekerjaan rumah (PR) yang sangat berat. Salah satunya yakni terkait mempersiapkan bangunan sekolah yang aman bagi proses belajar mengajar.Pakar Pendidikan, Asep Sapa'at menekankan, PR berat bagi Mendikbud Nadiem Makarim bukan hanya mempersiapkan bangunan jiwa yang kuat bagi para peserta didik. Tapi juga mempersiapkan bangunan fisik yang kuat pula."Sangat berat sekali. Karena dua hal, pendidikan adalah membangun jiwa. Tapi bagaimana kita membangun jiwa kalau bangun infrastruktur yang harusnya aman jadi tidak aman," katanya saat berbincang dengan Radio Republik Indonesia, Selasa (5/11/2019).Hal itu dia ungkapkan menanggapi robohnya bangunan sekolah di beberapa daerah. Yang paling anyar seperti yang terjadi di SDN Gentong, Kecamatan Gadingrejo, Kota Pasuruan, Selasa (5/11/2019) pagi tadi. Yang mana peristiwa nahas itu menyebabkan dua orang korban tewas. Yakni satu orang siswi dan satu orang guru.Diduga Asep, kasus robohnya bangunan sekolah terjadi karena adanya praktik korupsi yang terjadi di lingkungan birokrasi pendidikan di negeri ini.Maka dari itu, Asep meminta Mendikbud untuk turut aktif dalam memberantas dugaan kasus korupsi yang ada di lingkungan kementerian yang dipimpinnya."Sebenarnya banyak kasus seperti ini, yang ambruk. Sebenarnya yang perlu dipelajari adalah kita pahamlah kalau kita bicara korupsi, dunia pendidikan kontribusinya besar sekali, kasus-kasus korupsi terkait dengan dunia pendidikan besar sekali. Pembangunan gedung sekolah salah satunya, selain. juga pengadaan barang dan infrastruktur yang lain juga bisa dikorupsi. Bahayanya adalah pada saat terjadinya korupsi di dunia pendidikan kita, itu bisa berdampak pada anak kita," urainya. (Foto: Tangkap Layar/TVOne)

Collapsed School Building, Expert: New Minister of Education and Culture Has Large PR
05 Nov 2019, 17:13 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Collapsed School Building, Expert: New Minister of Education and Culture Has Large PR

KBRN, Jakarta: Minister of Education and Culture (Mendikbud) who has just been installed, Nadiem Makarim has very heavy homework. One of them is related to preparing a school building that is safe for the teaching and learning process. The Education Officer, Asep Sapa'at stressed, the homework for Mendikbud Nadiem Makarim is not only to prepare a strong building for the souls of the students. But also preparing a strong physical building as well. "Very heavy. Because of two things, education is building souls. But how do we build souls when building infrastructure that should be safe so it is not safe," he said while speaking with Radio Republik Indonesia, Tuesday (5 /11/2019).Hal said he expressed response to the collapse of school buildings in several areas. The newest one as happened in SDN Gentong, Gadingrejo District, Pasuruan City, Tuesday (11/5/2019) this morning. Which unfortunate event caused two deaths. Namely one student and one teacher. Allegedly Asep, the case of the collapse of the school building occurred because of corrupt practices that occur in the education bureaucracy in this country. So from that, Asep asked the Minister of Education and Culture to actively participate in eradicating alleged corruption cases in the environment the ministry he leads. "Actually, many cases like this, which collapsed. Actually what needs to be learned is that we understand that when we talk about corruption, the world of education has a huge contribution, corruption cases related to the world of education are enormous. Construction of school buildings is one of them, in addition to "Also the procurement of goods and other infrastructure can also be corrupted. The danger is that when corruption occurs in the world of our education, it can affect our children," he explained. (Photo: Screenshot / TVOne)
